### Collaboration focus

Dr. Thomas Quertermous is a leader in cardiovascular genetics and vascular biology at Stanford University. Our collaboration focuses on dissecting complex genetic mechanisms of vascular disease through the use of advanced mouse models, single-cell technologies, and integrative genomics.

Together, we study how genetic perturbations influence vascular cell states, disease susceptibility, and progressionâ€”bridging human genetic discovery with mechanistic in vivo modeling to identify causal pathways in cardiovascular disease.

**Shared areas of interest:**
- Complex mouse models of cardiovascular disease  
- Single-cell transcriptomic and epigenomic profiling  
- Genetic mechanisms underlying vascular biology  
- Translational models of coronary artery disease
